#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb(i) push_back(i)
#define mp(i,j) make_pair(i,j)
#define line printf("\n")
#define space printf(" ")
#define sci(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define scl(i) scanf("%lld",&i)
#define chk(a) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << endl
#define chk2(a,b) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << endl
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    cin.ignore();
    while(t--)
    {
      string str;
      getline(cin,str);
      int l=str.length();
      ll p=0;
      for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
      {
      	if(str[i]==' ')
      		{cout<<"$";
      		continue;}
      	ll q=str[i]-97;
      	cout<<q*q;
      	if(i!=l-1&&str[i+1]!=' ')
      		cout<<"-";
      }
      cout<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
